backup.camera-access-information: Si aad u abuurto kayd bulsho, waxaad u baahan doontaa inaad u ogolaato Fedi inuu galo kamaradaada si uu u duubo muuqaal xaqiijin ah

backup.start-social-backup-instructions: Social backups waxay kuu ogolaanaysaa inaad si badbaado leh ugu kaydiso boorsadaada asxaabta iyo qoyska oo ay leeyihiin mas'uuliyiinta Federaalku inay kaa caawiyaan inaad soo ceshato haddii aad lumiso gelitaanka

backup.video-file-too-large: Faylka fiidyaha aya aad u weyn,fadlan duub mid gaaban

omni.confirm-onchain-pay: Kani waa lacag bixinta bitcoin onchain, miyaad rabtaa inaad bixiso?

omni.unsupported-legacy-chat: Sheekadan QR waxay ka timid nooca abka oo aan hadda la taageerin. Waan ka xumahay!

omni.unsupported-unknown: Hmm, taasi maaha qaab aan aqoonsannahay. Waan ka xumahay!

onboarding.by-clicking-i-accept: Markaad gujiso 'waan aqbalay' waxaad ogolaatay shuruudaha adeega {{tos_url}}
onboarding.chat-earn-save-spend: La hadal, shaqeey, kaydso, oo si gaar ah lacag ula isticmaal beeshaada
onboarding.greeting-instructions: Hadda waxaad awood u leedahay inaad lacag soo dirto,la xiriirto bulshadaada,iyo wax badan oo aad la xiriirto fedi
onboarding.guidance-1: La hadal, shaqeey, kaydso, oo si gaar ah lacag ula isticmaal beeshaada
onboarding.guidance-2: Fedi waxay u isticmaashaa bulshadaada si ay u fududayso si ay u fududayso kaydinta iyo xadidida lacagtaada, u badasho lacagta maxaliga ah ama u hesho caawimo
onboarding.guidance-3: Fedi waxaad haysataa hadhaaga gaarka ah, lacag-bixinta iyo isgaadhsiinta si caadi ah, iyada oo aan dadaal la helin.
onboarding.guidance-4: Fedi waxay isticmaashaa bitcoin iyo shabakada hillaaca si ay kuugu xidho fursadaha caalamiga ah si aad lacag uga hesho khadka tooska ah shuruudahaaga.
onboarding.guidance-public-federations: Isku day bulshada liiska Fedimint ee cajiibka ah
onboarding.new-users-disabled-notice: Waan ka xunahay, xiriirkani ma aqbalayo isticmaalayaasha cusub
onboarding.unsupported-notice: Xiriirkan hadda lama taageero. Laguma biiri karo.
onboarding.username-instructions: Magacaagu wuxuu ahaan doonaa sida xubnaha kale ay kuu aqoonsan doonaan.
onboarding.welcome-instructions-new: Xubin cusub oo ka tirsan xiriirka, waxaad heli doontaa boorso cusub.
onboarding.welcome-instructions-returning: Xubin soo noqosho ah oo ka tirsan xiriirka, boorsadaada waa la soo celin doonaa. Tani waxay qaadan kartaa dhowr daqiiqo.
onboarding.welcome-instructions-unknown: Xubnaha cusub waxay helayaan boorso cusub. Xubnaha soo noqonaya si toos ah ayaa loogu soo ceshan doonaa jeebkoodii hore.

recovery.from-different-device: Laga soo bilaabo qalab kala duwan ilaa kan

recovery.locked-device-guidance-3: Haddii aad rabto inaad ku rakibto boorsada kale ee qalabkan, fadlan tirtir oo dib u rakib Fedi. 👍
recovery.migrated-device-guidance-1: Fedi waxaa la isticmaali karaa hal taleefon kaliya mar walba. Si aad akoonkaaga halkan ugu gurisato si ammaan ah:

recovery.migrated-device-guidance-4: ⚠️ Marka hore samee backup si aadan u lumin helitaanka lacagtaada!
recovery.migrated-device-success-guidance-2:
Hadda, ka saar Fedi taleefankan oo dib u install garee app-ka.

 Xusuusnow inaad isticmaasho erayada aad qortay si aad u soo ceshatid akoonkaaga.
recovery.migrated-device-success-guidance-3: Haddii aad u baahan tahay caawimaad, <anchor>halkan riix</anchor> si aad ula xiriirto kooxdeena taageerada
recovery.nothing-to-download: Ma jiro wax laga soo dejiyo mas'uulka
recovery.opening-backup-file-failed: Furitaanka faylka kaydka ah waa guuldareystay
recovery.opening-backup-file-failed-instructions: Backup file {{fileName}} waa ku guul daraystay in la furo. Fadlan isku day oo ka soo kabsato mid kale oo ka mid ah goobaha aad wadaagto.

recovery.paste-social-recovery-code-instead: Ku dheji koodka soo kabashada bulshada beddelkeeda
recovery.personal-recovery-instructions: Geli 12 kelmadood oo aad qortay markii ugu horaysay ee aad kaydisay boorsadaada
recovery.personal-recovery-method: Haddii aad qortay 12 kelmadood oo soo kabasho ah waxaad geli kartaa mar kale si aad u soo ceshato boorsadaada
recovery.recovery-assist-confirm-check-1: Xubinta kula joogtaa waa raaxo, degan oo aan kacsanayn
recovery.recovery-assist-confirm-check-2: Agagaarka dhow ee shaqsigu waa badbaado
recovery.recovery-assist-description: Xubin ka tirsan Xiriirkaaga ayaa ku codsanaya kaalmadaada si ay u soo ceshadaan jeebkooda
recovery.recovery-assist-instructions-1: 1. Hubi in xubintu degan tahay oo bedqabto
recovery.recovery-assist-instructions-3: 3. Daawo muuqaalkooda kaydka ah ee Fedi
recovery.recovery-assist-instructions-4: 4. Xaqiiji in ay isku qof yihiin fiidyowga kaydka ah
recovery.recovery-assist-instructions-5: 5. Oggolow ama diido codsiga soo kabashada xubnaha
recovery.recovery-assist-thank-you: Waad ku mahadsan tahay inaad gacan ka gaysatay soo celinta lacagta xubinta Federaalka
recovery.recovery-confirm-identity-instructions-1: Daawo muuqaalka si aad u xaqiijiso aqoonsiga xubinta.
recovery.recovery-confirm-identity-instructions-2: Fiidiyowgani miyuu tusiyaa isla xubinta isku dayaya inay sameeyaan soo kabasho bulsho hadda?
recovery.recovery-confirm-identity-no: Maya, qofka muuqaalku la mid maaha xubinta
recovery.recovery-confirm-identity-yes: Haa, qofka muuqaalka ku jira waa isla qofka xubinta

recovery.recovery-in-progress-chat-payments: Soo kabashada ayaa socota Lacagaha wada sheekaysiga ayaa dhawaan la heli doonaa
recovery.recovery-in-progress-payments: Soo kabashada ayaa socota Lacagaha ayaa la heli doonaa dhawaan.
recovery.select-a-device-guidance: Dooro qalab aad kaga wareejinayso boorsada jira
recovery.social-recovery-instructions: Fur faylkaaga Fedi ee soo kabashada bulshada kaas oo la abuuray markii aad duubtay fiidyahaaga kaydka ah. Waxaan kugu dhiirigelinay inaad kaydiso faylka oo aad la wadaagto asxaabta.
recovery.social-recovery-method: Haddii aad duubtay muuqaal, la kulan mas'uuliyiinta si ay u caddeeyaan aqoonsigaaga
recovery.social-recovery-unsuccessful-instruction: Isku day inaad dib ugu noqoto mas'uuliyiinta oo aad caddayso aqoonsigaaga
recovery.successfully-opened-fedi-file: Si guul leh u furay Fedi File kaaga
recovery.transfer-existing-wallet-guidance-1: Tani waxay keenaysaa boorsadaada hadda jirta ee qalabkan oo waxay ku xidhi doontaa boorsada qalabka kale.
recovery.transfer-existing-wallet-guidance-2: Uma baahnid qalabkii hore si aad u wareejiso
recovery.try-social-recovery-again: Isku day mar labaad soo kabashada bulshada
recovery.you-completed-personal-recovery: Waxaad dhamaystirtay Soo kabashada Shakhsi ahaaneed
